data.description: Add fcntl.flock() to wal.py:165-170 log() method to prevent concurrent WAL corruption. Race condition allows interleaved JSON writes.

properties.retrospective: Added ProcessLock from cortical.utils.locking to WALManager.log() method. Also removed unnecessary fsync from ProcessLock holder info write.

data.title: CRITICAL: Add file locking to WAL append operations
